name: CANnon (R3dleg)
description:
A cannon - shooting soupcans - controled by YOU

You play as Andy Warhol, who gets his creativity by cooking soup. But the hungries are lose! They want to steal all your precious art.  Fortunately there is hope: hungries are addicted to soup-cans! (Which all are original flavours out of the Campbell`s Soup cans. Just shoot em with your giant CANon and match the color of the can with the color of the hungries. You have to manualy reload and control your weapon by walking to the spots.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Shoot the Hungries with the cantype that matches their color.

To shoot you have to stay on the CANnon-controler

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

You WALK with WASD

You SHOOT   with "F" or LEFT MOUSE CLICK    - while on target control

You RELOAD with "F" or LEFT MOUSE CLICK   - while on the soup-pans

You COLLECT by walking in the items

ESC for menu

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HUNGRIES get stronger over time

The more you feed, the more Points you score

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

HAVE FUN! :D

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Infos: I created this game in 48 hours for the PaintJam2021. All my art was created in that time period with MS paint only. All the sound and music was created in that time aswell using only my mouth. I sang in a note and played it transposed to every other note on my digital keyboard. Grey area i guess ^^. I didn`t use a drawing tablet and had a lot of fun. Hope you guys enjoy. It was my first game ever and this is my first, published small game.
